content.description: Climb up the left most side of the boulder
content.location: This is the first climb you will come across when coming around the corner from Skirt Roof. It should be on your immediate left when the area opens up. Its down and left from Backwards Reflector

content.description: This one starts on the right side of the boulder on edges in the middle. Climb up on slopey edges/crimps and make a move left to a nice edge in a crack feature then climb straight up and top out. Harder than it looks.
content.location: On the same boulder as the V0, around the arete on the right side of the boulder.

content.description: Start on a left hand edge and a right hand undercling. Climb straight up on crimps and edges, then do a big move out left to the lip and top out over that. This might be the best V5 in the Notch.
content.location: When the New World area opens up this climb should be in a cave on the left. You can also access it by walking up to Biscuit and taking a right through the cave thats below the Gravy boulder.

content.description: Start matched on a vertical crack/flake, then make a big move out right to another vertical flake. Bump up left then hit the lip and top out. Very solid climb.
content.location: To the right of the Backwards Reflector cave

pathTokens: Boulders Behind the Main Parking Lot/Visitor Center

content.description: This area has a few nice moderate climbs and its close to the parking lot.
